info: The End Sword can be obtained at the Weaponsmith, or by putting a stick in the bottom right of the crafting table, and an ender pearl in the top left and middle slot. The End Sword is commonly used to Sword Swap on the Dragon with a Runaan's Bow to deal further more damage because of the sword ability.
